description.0: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

0.0: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by <cryo>60%</cryo>. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by <cryo>48%</cryo>. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>240</cryo>.
